# popoverTouchBar

**Instance Property**

The bar displayed when this item is “popped.”

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var popoverTouchBar: NSTouchBar { get set }
```

## Discussion

Set this property to a fully configured instance of [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTouchBar] that is displayed when the user taps on the popover item. By default this is an empty bar.

## Configuring the expanded popover

- **showsCloseButton**: A Boolean value that determines whether a close button should be shown on the popover bar.
- **pressAndHoldTouchBar**: The bar that is displayed when a user press-and-holds on the popover item.
